for_sales.sales_text:
1933 James A. Silver 42" Silver Leaf class motor yacht, "Canowie II" retains her original oak interior and is lying N. Essex.

Hull pitch pine on oak with teak wheelhouse, twin 45hp diesels, serviced 2014. New batteries. Complete bottom overhaul including new keelbolts in 2013. New galley and rewiring, 2014. Six berths, two toilets plus bath.

boat.full_description:
'Canowie ll' has had several owners, retaining much of her original features and fittings.

She has been kept in Scotland, London, the Upper Thames, Leicester, France and back to Scotland where she was purchased by David Skinner in 2012.
boat.name: Canowie ll
boat.short_description: 'Canowie ll' is a Silvers 42' Silver Leaf class motor yacht built in 1933.
